generated_description: tuscaloosa va federal credit union is a not-for-profit, member-owned financial cooperative based in northport, alabama. established in november 1951, the credit union was formed by seven employees at the tuscaloosa va medical center to meet the financial needs of their colleagues. it expanded its membership to the entire community of tuscaloosa county in 2004 and further extended its services to sumter county in 2003. the credit union offers a range of financial services, including savings and checking accounts, iras, loans, and visa credit cards. it is federally insured by the national credit union administration (ncua) and is committed to providing affordable, convenient, and professional financial services to its members.
